channel.description: Recent content in standards on cyberme0w's

item.title: XDG
item.description: Quick, no time for questions! Open a terminal and run: ls -A | wc -l That’s the number of files, folders and other tidbits that have been placed in your $HOME (with or without your blessing). Can you justify that number? Do you even know what is going on there? Personally, I like to keep my home as clean as possible, so let’s take a look and try to do a little spring cleaning.
